text: Stephen, Steven or Steve Paul may refer to: * Stephen Paul (physicist) (1953–2012), physicist at Princeton University * Stephen Paul (woodworker) (born 1951), American woodworker and craft distiller * Esteban (musician) (Stephen Paul, born 1948), American guitarist * Steve Paul (1941–2012), manager of Johnny Winter and club owner * Steven Paul (born 1959), film producer and manager * Steven M. Paul, neuroscientist and pharmaceutical executive * Steven Paul (fencer) (1954-2019), British fencer. ==See also== * Steve Jobs (1955–2011), American tech mogul, full name Steven Paul Jobs
title: Stephen Paul
